text: Apani ki dekhena na ye, allahake sajada kare yara ache asamanasamuhe o yara ache yamine, ara surya, camda, naksatramandali, parbataraji, brksalata, jibajantu [1] ebam sajada kare manusera madhye aneke [2]? Abara anekera prati abadharita hayeche sasti [3]. Allah yake heya karena [4] tara sam'manadata ke'u'i ne'i; niscaya allah ya icche ta karena
